name: PocketHost
title: pockethost.io
shortDescription: PocketHost simplifies backend configuration, allowing developers to focus on building features for web apps. It offers a complete backend solution with database, SSL, authentication, and cloud functions. Ideal for developers looking to quickly deploy apps without server management. An example use case is a startup developing a mobile app needing fast and reliable backend services without the overhead of server setup.
pros: Easy export for in-house project transition
cons: Limited to SQLite, may not scale like SQL databases
Limited customization options for advanced users

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Firebase
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers broader cloud services and scalability
